metadata.title: USN-4352-2 -- OpenLDAP vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-4352-1 fixed a vulnerability in OpenLDAP. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that OpenLDAP incorrectly handled certain queries. A  remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause OpenLDAP to consume  resources, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4352-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ldap-utils - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm2 libldap2-dev - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm2 libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm2 slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm2 slapd - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.5+esm2 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
